title: React.useEffect çš„æ•ˆæœï¼Œä¸ºä»€ä¹ˆè¿˜è·Ÿå¸§ç‡æœ‰å…³ï¼Ÿ bug åˆ°åº•å‡ºåœ¨å“ªé‡Œï¼Ÿ
content_rendered:
ä¸‹é¢æ˜¯æœ€å° demo ï¼Œé€»è¾‘å¾ˆç®€å•ï¼šcount éšç€é¼ æ ‡æ»šè½®æ»šåŠ¨ï¼Œä¸æ–­å¢åŠ ++ï¼Œé€šè¿‡{divs}æ¸²æŸ“å‡º count ã€‚

const useWheel = (count:number, setCount)=>{
    let refDiv = useRef<HTMLDivElement>(null);
    useEffect(()=>{
        let el = refDiv.current;
        let callback = (ev:WheelEvent)=>{
            ev.preventDefault();
            setCount(count+Math.floor(Math.abs(ev.deltaY/5)));
        };
        el.addEventListener("wheel", callback, {passive:false});
        return (()=>{el.removeEventListener('wheel', callback);});
    }, [count]);
    return refDiv;
}

export const Main = (props)=>{
    let [count, setCount] = useState<number>(0);
    let wheel = useWheel(count, setCount);
    let divs = (new Array<number>(25000)).fill(0).map((v,i)=>(<div key={i+count}>{i+count}</div>));
    return (<div ref={wheel}>
                {divs}
            </div> );
}

ä½†å®é™…ä¸Šï¼Œæ¸²æŸ“çš„ count ä¼šæœ‰ã€Œå¿½å¢å¿½å‡ã€çš„ç°è±¡ï¼Œæ„Ÿè§‰ä¸æ­£å¸¸ã€‚è€Œå¦‚æœæŠŠ 25000 æ¡æ”¹ä¸º 50 æ¡ï¼Œæ¸²æŸ“å¸§ç‡æé«˜ï¼Œå°±ä¸ä¼šæœ‰åŒæ ·çš„é—®é¢˜äº†ã€‚
